body.name: Munchkin® Fishin'™ Magnetic Baby and Toddler Bath Toy, 4pc Set
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 15 mins
features: Bath toy set contains (1) magnetic fishing rod and (3) underwater bobbing characters
Characters float with magnets on top for easy fishing
Characters are air tight, helping to limit mold and mildew
Magnetic bobbers help develop hand eye coordination
Suitable for little boys and girls 24 months and up; Care and cleaning: Rinse with warm water, wipe clean, hand wash, air dry
body.description: Pint sized explorers love bath activities that keep them busy and engaged in the tub. Introduce "reel" bath time fun with the Fishing Bath Toy by Munchkin. The magnetic fishing hook easily picks up sea creatures (which double as bobbing bath toys), and the handle is specially made to fit toddler hands. The reel even makes fun clicking sounds when turned, giving it a more realistic feel. Great for developing hand eye coordination and teaching cause and effect, too, so your little one falls hook, line and sinker for bath time learning fun.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎To clean: Rinse with water and allow to air dry before storing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: #1 Baby Bath Brand* Munchkin’s fun and creative line of bath products has everything you need to stay organized, have fun, and engage your little one’s imagination. Make bathtime a splash hit every time with Munchkin. *Munchkin is the #1 Bath Brand according to Baby IRI data. (Latest 52 weeks ending April 17, 2022). Hook, Line and Sinker Introduce reel bathtime fun with the Fishin' Bath Toy by Munchkin. The magnetic fishing hook easily picks up sea creatures (which double as bobbing bath toys), and the handle is specially made to fit toddler hands. The reel even makes fun clicking sounds when turned, giving it a more realistic feel. Great for developing hand-eye coordination and teaching cause and effect, too - so your little one falls hook, line and sinker for bathtime learning fun.
Fishin Baby and Toddler Bath Toy Bath toy set contains (1) magnetic fishing rod and (3) underwater bobbersHelps develop hand-eye coordinationGreat for boys and girls 24 months+Makes a great gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bath toy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bath toy for my 2-year-old son, and he loves it! The magnetic fishing rod is easy for him to grip, and the three fish are colorful and fun to catch. The toy is also made of durable materials, so it can withstand a lot of splashing and water play.Overall, I think the fishing toy is a great choice for the little ones. It is fun, engaging, and promotes hand-eye coordination. I would definitely recommend it to other parents. I used this in attempt to get my 2 year old who just started disliking baths suddenly a little more excitement. It is definitely helping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good bath toy!
reviews.reviewText: This has become my daughters favorite bath time toy! Munchkin brand has always been a excellent quality brand and I expected no less from this toy. It so far had held up well for my toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved this purchase for my grandson. He loves it in the tub or out. Easy for little hands to use. Price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Toy - Wish there were more fish
reviews.reviewText: This is a great bath toy for my almost 2 toddler. He loves it both for bathtime and just for playing around the house. Nice quality.I only wish it came with more fish or that a extra add on pack of fish was available to purchase separately. Please make more fish available and it'd be 5 stars instead of 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and fun!
reviews.reviewText: My 2.5 year old loves “fishing” with this bath set! Took him a minute to figure out how the magnets/connections work, (you have to hold the fishing rod/string pretty steady above the little bobble balls in order for proper connection) but after a few tries, he got the technique down! Easy for little hands to hold, connect, disconnect, etc. Bright, colorful and well made. Even the fishing net is durable and easy to clean. The only “downfall” IMHO, is the rotatable reel. It’s hard for him to turn due to such a small handle to hold and rotate at the same time. It makes a cute “clicking” sound when you turn the reel. Not a huge deal for him though, and doesn’t take away from the continuous fun! Just keep in mind that the “hook” is magnetic and will stick to anything metal, lol. My LO got frustrated at first when it kept sticking to the side of the tub, yet again, he quickly figured it out. :) Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and fishing rod doesn’t actually reel in
reviews.reviewText: These are cute but it’s pretty cheap plastic and I thought the fishing rod would actually wind up and reel in because it does wind up but the steering doesn’t move. I feel was a missed opportunity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bath toy!
reviews.reviewText: This little fishing pole is a great toy to make bath time fun : ]

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time. I bought a cheaper model of this game. I was totally disappointed with those for a 1 yro boy. Small pieces, not happening!.This is the one that was requested by my daughter and I looked at the almighty dollar and went cheap.This item is so much nicer and after all is said and done this toy is a winner for its price. TEL

My son ripped the handle of his bath bucket and said he was going fishing, so I thought it was time to get him a proper fishing rod.The rod is perfect in size for my 2.5 year old. Its not too big where he is hitting the wall or where I am worried he will hit himself in the head with it. Its a nice bright and colourful green and easy to hold. The reel just makes clicking sounds which he is not very interested in.The fish are bottom heavy so they always float upright with the magnets facing up. This makes them easy to catch when you hover over them. The magnets are quite strong as well. If you have a metallic tub they will stick and stay. Even when wet and covered in soap they will not slide down, so I would say the magnets are good quality. My son has thrown and banged them many times and none have broke, cracked or lost their magnetism to date.I was initially disappointed that the rope didn't retract, I knew this before I bought it. But after giving it some thought, thinking about the soap and water going inside the rod and the mould that would occur, I am very happy it does. Makes rinsing and cleaning much easier and I know its not a toy that will make my son ill.My only complaint is I wish it came with 5 fish or you could buy others separately and in different styles.Overall, this is an excellent fishing set and would buy again and I may to get some additional fish and another rod to play along.Pros:- great bath time fun- easy to hold and play with; helps develop hand and eye coordination- quality is quite good and magnets are stronger than expectedCons:- would like more fish

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality. Fantastic magnet. Already a favourite in the bath.
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. Fantastic magnet. Already a favourite in the bath.

Good quality and my son loves it.
Purchased a few bath fishing rods and they were quick to break. This one has held up great quality and love the floating scuba diver , fish and octopus
